idea:
With Over A Decade Of Experience And Expertise In The Field Of Flexible And Rigid Packaging, We Have Crafted A Niche In The Packaging Industry, Specializing In Secondary Packaging And Tertiary Packaging Material For Pharmaceutical Industries, Agro & Pesticides Industries, Cosmetic Industries, FMCG, And Industrial Packing.

Our Main Focus is to develop Sustainable Cost effective product for Pharmaceutical Industries .

Our vision for the future is to develop Ayurvedic, Herbal Natural product in Healthcare and Cosmetic Industry which are result oriented and clinically tested.
name: DUNAMIS PACKAGING PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: Using a circular economy model, The Recycle Company, aims to upcycle End-of-Life Tires (ELTs) into high quality, sustainable and commercially viable rubber products that will cater as waste to energy and find applicability in other areas such as construction, landscaping and extraction of recovered carbon black (rCB).
name: The Recycle Company
